content.title: Export Symlink
content.subtitle: Create symlinks for the currently selected items in Eagle.
content.hintLinkType: Symlink points to the original file. Hard Link creates another file entry on the same drive.
content.stepSelectItems: Select items inside an Eagle folder.
content.stepChooseDestination: Choose a destination folder when prompted.
content.stepFolderSelected: If a folder is selected in Eagle, symlinks are created inside a subfolder with the same name.
content.stepNoFolder: If no folder is selected, symlinks are created directly in the export destination root.
content.hintNote: Note: Hard links only work on the same drive. Symlinks may require permission depending on OS settings.
content.noItemsSelected: No items selected. Select items in Eagle and try again.
content.noItemsSelectedOnLoad: No items selected. Please select items in Eagle.
content.errorEperm: You need to enable Windows Developer Mode. Please refer to the URL and enable Developer Mode.
content.errorExdev: Hard links must be created on the same disk.
